experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Dubber, Melbourne
workDescription: Planned architecture and developed an identity provider (IDP) for a multinational supermarket chain, reducing the running cost almost by 10% and improving the system’s response time.
Led a team in redesigning the deployment pipeline using Jenkins, reducing release time from 3 hours to  45 minutes.

Created a new application that transcribes a voice recording to text using speech-to-text API. By enabling users to analyse their call interactions, it helped improve customer satisfaction and identify potential issues, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Quick Check, London
workDescription: Refactored an application due to issues with performance and looming bottlenecks, increasing in response speed and enhancing scalability to handle larger workloads.

Implemented innovative check-in solutions for restaurants and hotels using React, streamlining their reservation and guest management processes. These enhancements improved guest satisfaction, and increased operational efficiency.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: Scholly, Los Angeles
workDescription: Developed a whole cross-platform application from the beginning, starting from the sketches to the standalone product.

Suggested and implemented improvements in application development to enhance compatibility with the existing API, streamlining the scholarship matching algorithm and AI-powered academic support tools. This resulted in more accurate scholarship recommendations, faster processing times, and easier updates in future iterations.
